price: 171. They rejoice in a Grace and a Bounty from Allâh, and that Allâh will not waste the reward of the believers.
arabic: ۞ يَسۡتَبۡشِرُونَ بِنِعۡمَةٖ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَفَضۡلٖ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: yastabshirūna biniʿ'matin mina al-lahi wafaḍlin wa-anna al-laha lā yuḍīʿu ajra al-mu'minīna
